id.description: A unique identifier for this account.

name.description: The human-friendly name of this account.

type.description: What sort of account this is, e.g. ``imap``, ``nntp``, or ``pop3``.

identities.description: The identities associated with this account. The default identity is listed first, others in no particular order.

accountId.description: The id of the :ref:`accounts.MailAccount` this identity belongs to.

id.description: A unique identifier for this identity.

label.description: A user-defined label for this identity.

name.description: The user's name as used when messages are sent from this identity.

email.description: The user's email address as used when messages are sent from this identity.

replyTo.description: The reply-to email address associated with this identity.

organization.description: The organization associated with this identity.
